trans-unit.source: Used to create a placeholder object whenever the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized*> method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 用來建立預留位置物件每當<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized*>方法會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized*>

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set provides an authorization mechanism for determining whether individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls can be added to a page.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件控制項集合提供授權機制，可判斷是否個別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>可以將控制項加入至頁面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Developers can optionally assign an arbitrary string to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員可以選擇性指派到的任意字串<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is adding controls to a page, it checks this filter value against criteria set by the developer, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> method, and returns `false` if a control is not authorized.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項將控制項加入至網頁，它會檢查此篩選器根據值設定，開發人員所使用的準則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A>方法，並傳回`false`如果控制項未獲授權。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsAuthorized%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This mechanism also works with server controls and user controls that are placed in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones, because these controls are wrapped with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object at run time, and this object inherits the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個機制也適用於伺服器控制項和使用者控制項放入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域，因為這些控制項以包裝<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>執行階段物件，這個物件會繼承<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is not authorized, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control inserts an UnauthorizedWebPart control into the control tree of the page in place of the unauthorized control.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項未獲授權，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項 UnauthorizedWebPart 控制項插入未經授權的控制項取代頁面上的控制項樹狀架構。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: An UnauthorizedWebPart control in the control tree reserves the position of the unauthorized control in the page, and prevents any personalization data that a user might have previously applied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control from being lost.
trans-unit.target: UnauthorizedWebPart 中的控制項的控制項樹狀結構保留在頁面中，未經授權的控制項的位置，並防止使用者可能會有先前套用至任何個人化資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項遺失。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The UnauthorizedWebPart control is never displayed on a page in which it is inserted, nor does it appear in the source code for the rendered page.
trans-unit.target: UnauthorizedWebPart 控制項永遠不會顯示在頁面上，在其中插入它，或它不會顯示在轉譯頁面的原始程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: Developers can verify its presence in the page control tree by checking the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員可以藉由檢查確認頁面上的控制項樹狀結構中出現<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart"></xref> control, called when a static <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control (or server or user control) fails authorization.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart"></xref>稱為時靜態控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項 （或伺服器或使用者控制項） 授權就會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The UnauthorizedWebPart constructor takes a static control `webPart` as a parameter, where `webPart` has failed an authorization check.
trans-unit.target: UnauthorizedWebPart 建構函式接受靜態控制項`webPart`做為參數，其中`webPart`授權檢查失敗。

trans-unit.source: A static control is one that is declared in the markup of a Web page, rather than being added programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 靜態控制項是在網頁上，而不是以程式設計方式加入標記中宣告的。

trans-unit.source: The constructor returns a new instance of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control, which is added to the page's control tree in place of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式傳回的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>控制項，加入至網頁的控制項樹狀架構取代`webPart`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> that has failed to be authorized by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>由授權失敗<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart"></xref> control, called when a dynamic <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control (or server or user control) fails authorization.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart"></xref>稱為時動態控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項 （或伺服器或使用者控制項） 授權就會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The UnauthorizedWebPart constructor is called when a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control fails its authorization check.
trans-unit.target: UnauthorizedWebPart 建構函式呼叫時動態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或其他伺服器控制項失敗其授權檢查。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A dynamic control is one that is added to a page programmatically, or by a user from a catalog of Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: 動態控制項是以程式設計的方式，加入至頁面，或由使用者從類別目錄 Web 組件的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The UnauthorizedWebPart constructor returns a new instance of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control to replace the dynamic control that failed authorization.
trans-unit.target: UnauthorizedWebPart 建構函式傳回的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>控制項取代動態控制項授權失敗。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the original server or user control that was added to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> to participate in a Web Parts application.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含已加入至原始伺服器或使用者控制項的 ID <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref>參與 Web 組件的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the name of the original control's type.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含原始的控制項類型的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the relative virtual path to the user control, if the original control is a user control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含使用者控制項的相對虛擬路徑，如果原始的控制項是一個使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control that wraps the original server or user control.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含識別碼<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>包裝原始的伺服器或使用者控制項的控制項。
